title: When will the 3 new project skin and project chest be released?
body: So its 6.15 so I was wondering when will project ashe, katarina, ekko, and project chest will be out because I really want to buy them.

replies.body: We don't have insight on content that hasn't been released.  The recent patch notes stated that new skins are on the way, but I recommend keeping an eye out at our [news page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to stay updated on announcements and releases.  Hang tight!
